Ang tanong kung ang isang 9-taong-gulang na bata ay may "conviction sa kasalanan" ay malalim at maaaring tumukoy sa dalawang aspeto: ang abilidad na maintindihan ang konsepto ng kasalanan at kasamaan, at ang moral na pananagutan (moral accountability) para sa kanilang mga kilos.  Narito ang pagtalakay gamit ang iyong pormat:  **Most Possible Psychological Issue (What it is called):** **Developing Moral Reasoning and Understanding of Guilt/Sin**  **Causes:** *   **Cognitive Development:** Sa edad na 9, ang mga bata ay nasa yugto pa rin ng pag-unlad ng kanilang cognitive abilities. Nagagawa na nilang maintindihan ang mas kumplikadong konsepto ngunit maaaring hindi pa ganap na nauunawaan ang abstract na konsepto ng "kasalanan" sa parehong paraan ng isang adulto. *   **Moral Development (Ayon kay Kohlberg):** Ang mga batang 9-anyos ay karaniwang nasa **Conventional Level** ng Moral Development ni Lawrence Kohlberg, partikular sa:     *   **Stage 3: Good Interpersonal Relationships (Good Boy/Good Girl Orientation):** Sa yugtong ito, ang bata ay gumagawa ng tama upang matugunan ang expectations ng iba, lalo na ng mga magulang at guro, at upang makakuha ng pagtanggap. Ang tama ay ang makapagp-please sa iba.     *   **Stage 4: Maintaining Social Order (Law and Order Orientation):** Maaari ring magsimulang lumipat ang bata sa yugtong ito, kung saan ang tama ay ang pagsunod sa mga batas at alituntunin upang mapanatili ang kaayusan sa lipunan. Kinikilala na nila ang awtoridad at ang sistema ng mga patakaran [(simplypsychology.org)](https://www.simplypsychology.org/kohlberg.html) [(explorepsychology.com)](https://www.explorepsychology.com/kohlbergs-stages-of-moral-development/). *   **Social Learning:** Ang pag-aaral tungkol sa tama at mali ay nagmumula sa mga kahihinatnan ng kanilang mga aksyon, positibo man o negatibo. Natututunan nila na may mga oras na sila ay nakakakuha ng problema at may mga oras na pinupuri sila [(mypositiveparenting.org)](https://mypositiveparenting.org/2018/05/27/guilt-and-shame-in-children/). *   **Religious/Spiritual Upbringing:** Kung ang bata ay lumalaki sa isang relihiyosong pamilya, unti-unti niyang natututunan ang mga turo tungkol sa kasalanan, pagsisisi, at pagpapatawad mula sa mga magulang at simbahan [(focusonthefamily.com)](https://www.focusonthefamily.com/parenting/how-to-repent-a-guide-to-forgiveness-for-your-kids/) [(momlifetoday.com)](https://momlifetoday.com/how-to-explain-sin-to-a-child/).  **Symptoms and complication to health:** *   **Understanding of Guilt:** Sa edad na 9, karaniwang nakakaranas na ang mga bata ng pakiramdam ng **guilt** kapag nakagawa sila ng mali, lalo na kung alam nilang nilabag nila ang isang patakaran o nasaktan ang damdamin ng iba. Ito ay isang mahalagang bahagi ng moral development. *   **Conscience Development:** Mayroon na silang "budhi" (conscience) na gumagabay sa kanila at nagdudulot ng "masamang pakiramdam" kapag sila ay nagkakasala [(thegospelcoalition.org)](https://www.thegospelcoalition.org/article/teach-children-conscience/). *   **Fear of Punishment:** Dahil nasa Preconventional at Conventional stages pa sila, ang kanilang pang-unawa sa kasalanan ay maaaring nakatali pa sa konsepto ng kaparusahan (Stage 1) o hindi pagtanggap ng iba (Stage 3). *   **Difficulty with Abstract Concepts:** Maaari pa rin silang mahirapan sa mas abstract na teolohikal na konsepto ng "kasalanan" bilang paglabag sa kalooban ng Diyos, sa halip na simpleng "paglabag sa patakaran" o "paggawa ng mali na may masamang resulta." *   **Potential for Shame:** Kung hindi maayos ang paggabay, ang pakiramdam ng guilt ay maaaring mauwi sa **shame**, kung saan ang bata ay nakakaramdam ng kahihiyan sa kanyang pagkatao sa halip na sa kanyang ginawa. Ang shame ay mas damaging sa self-esteem kaysa sa guilt. *   **Anxiety/Stress:** Ang pagkabalisa sa paggawa ng mali o takot sa kaparusahan ay maaaring humantong sa stress o anxiety.  **Basic Explanation:** Sa edad na 9, ang isang bata ay may kakayahan nang **maunawaan ang konsepto ng tama at mali** at karaniwan nang nakakaranas ng **guilt** kapag sila ay nagkakasala o lumabag sa mga patakaran. Nakikita na nila ang kanilang mga aksyon bilang "mali" o "kasalanan" lalo na kung alam nilang magdudulot ito ng kaparusahan o pagkadismaya sa mga nakapaligid sa kanila (tulad ng magulang, guro, o kaibigan). Sa konteksto ng relihiyon, natututunan na rin nila ang mga turo tungkol sa kasalanan.  Gayunpaman, ang kanilang "conviction sa kasalanan" ay maaaring nakabase pa rin sa **kahihinatnan ng kanilang aksyon** (hal., "mali ito dahil papaluin ako" o "mali ito dahil magagalit si Nanay") kaysa sa mas malalim na moral o teolohikal na pag-unawa ng isang adulto (hal., "mali ito dahil labag sa utos ng Diyos" o "mali ito dahil nakakasama sa aking kapwa at sa sarili ko"). Nagsisimula na silang magkaroon ng sariling budhi, ngunit patuloy pa rin itong nahuhubog.  **Practical Steps to Cope (para sa magulang/tagapag-alaga sa paggabay sa 9-anyos):** 1.  **Magpaliwanag Tungkol sa Tama at Mali:** Patuloy na ipaliwanag sa bata kung ano ang tama at mali, hindi lang sa pamamagitan ng pagtukoy ng mga patakaran, kundi pati na rin ang **dahilan** sa likod ng mga patakaran na iyon (e.g., "Mali ang magsinungaling dahil nakakasira ito ng tiwala at nakakasakit ng damdamin"). 2.  **Ihiwalay ang Gawa sa Gumawa:** Kapag nagkakasala ang bata, tiyakin na ipinaalam mo sa kanya na ang **aksyon** niya ang mali, hindi ang **kanyang pagkatao**. Ito ay upang maiwasan ang shame at maitatag ang healthy guilt. 3.  **Turuan ang Konsepto ng Pagsisisi at Pagpapatawad:**     *   Ipaliwanag na ang pagsisisi ay hindi lang paghingi ng tawad, kundi ang pagbabago ng puso at pagtatalaga na hindi na muling gagawin ang pagkakamali [(focusonthefamily.com)](https://www.focusonthefamily.com/parenting/how-to-repent-a-guide-to-forgiveness-for-your-kids/).     *   Bigyan siya ng pagkakataong humingi ng tawad at magpatawad. 4.  **Hayaan Silang Maranasan ang Natural na Konsekwensya:** Sa ilang pagkakataon, hayaang maranasan ng bata ang natural na resulta ng kanilang pagkakamali (halimbawa, kung hindi siya nag-aral, bagsak ang grades). Ito ay makakatulong sa kanila na matuto mula sa kanilang mga desisyon. 5.  **Maging Modelo ng Moralidad:** Ang iyong sariling moral na pag-uugali at desisyon ay malaking impluwensya sa kanilang moral development. 6.  **Buksan ang Usapan Tungkol sa Pananampalataya (kung applicable):** Kung ang pamilya ay relihiyoso, ipaliwanag ang konsepto ng kasalanan, pagpapatawad, at awa ng Diyos sa paraang naiintindihan ng isang 9-taong-gulang. Ayon sa Bibliya, may mga bagay na Diyos lang ang nakakaalam tulad ng age of accountability ng bawat bata [(truthforkids.com)](https://truthforkids.com/age-of-accountability/). 7.  **Magbigay ng Guidance, Hindi Pagtatakot:** Ang layunin ay turuan silang maunawaan ang tama at mali at gawin ang tama dahil ito ay tama, hindi lang dahil sa takot sa parusa.  Sa madaling salita, ang isang 9-taong-gulang ay may kapasidad nang maunawaan ang pagkakasala at makaramdam ng guilt. Ang kanilang pag-unawa ay patuloy pa ring lumalalim, at ang paggabay ng mga magulang ay susi sa paghubog ng kanilang moral na pananagutan.

Hi there!  Thanks for reaching out! I understand you're wondering how to get your profile more noticed, especially during holiday periods, and you also prefer to speak with a person.  Holiday periods can sometimes see different activity patterns as members may have their own family plans or travel commitments during those times. To help your home get more visibility, I recommend making sure your home profile is fully optimized with great photos and a compelling description. You can edit your home profile details directly in the app by going to your Profile tab, selecting "Home," and clicking "Edit Home Details."  For photos, you can upload your own using our Photography Guidelines Guide, or if you're eligible, you might be able to schedule complimentary professional photography - just check your home profile for prompts about this option.  Hope this helps. Feel free to let us know if anything else comes up!  **Internal Note:** | concern : | Member concerned about lack of inquiries for holiday listings, asked for tips to improve profile visibility, and expressed preference to speak to a person instead of AI. | | reso : | Acknowledged holiday activity patterns, provided tips for profile optimization (photos, description), and mentioned options for photography. | | action taken : | Advised on profile improvement and photography options. | | no fup | resolved |  **Template used:** No specific template. Response based on general profile optimization.  **Where in Kindred notes/policy/reference/template/what to do/faqs/update I have provided:** *   **FAQs > How to Prep for a Kindred Guest > Room-by-room prep guide:** (Suggests importance of presentation). *   **FAQs > Kindred Photography Guidelines:** (Details on how to take good photos).

Here's a slide presentation outline on "Christian Preaching: The Power to Activate," focusing on unleashing divine potential through proclamation:  ### Christian Preaching: The Power to Activate #### Unleashing Divine Potential Through Proclamation *Presenter: Sapiens AI*  ### Understanding Activating Power in Preaching *   What does 'power to activate' mean in a Christian context?     *   It's about moving beyond simply conveying information to inspiring genuine transformation in listeners' lives [growchurch.net](https://growchurch.net/how-to-preach-with-power). *   Moving beyond information to transformation *   The role of the Holy Spirit in empowering the message     *   Preaching in the power of the Holy Spirit is essential, as the act of preaching and its aim are humanly impossible without it [desiringgod.org](https://www.desiringgod.org/messages/how-to-preach-in-the-power-of-the-spirit). The Holy Spirit's empowerment is indispensable for Christian preaching [ministrymagazine.org](https://www.ministrymagazine.org/archive/2005/10/seven-habits-of-spirit-empowered-preaching.html).  ### Biblical Foundations for Activating Preaching *   The words of Jesus: "Go and do likewise" (Luke 10:37) *   Apostolic preaching in Acts: Demonstrations of power (Acts 2:37)     *   The early church demonstrated the transformative power of the Holy Spirit in their evangelistic efforts, emphasizing witnessing with power [biblehub.com](https://biblehub.com/topical/w/witnessing_with_power.htm). *   Prophetic utterances: Speaking life and change into situations (Ezekiel 37)     *   God is willing to impart His power into believers, as demonstrated by over 50 years of Spirit-filled ministry in the Pentecostal tradition [jimfeeney.org](https://www.jimfeeney.org/Gods-power-sermons.html).  ### Components of a Power-Activating Message *   Clear proclamation of God's Word *   Anointing of the Holy Spirit *   Faith-filled delivery and expectation *   Practical application and actionable steps for listeners  ### Preparing to Preach with Activating Power *   Deep spiritual preparation: Prayer and fasting *   Studying the Word for revelation and insight *   Cultivating a dependency on the Holy Spirit     *   Believers can activate the power of the Holy Spirit through speaking and acting their faith [cappsministries.com](https://cappsministries.com/pages/activating-gods-power-in-your-body). *   Understanding your audience and their needs  ### Delivering the Message: Engaging for Activation *   Preaching with conviction and authority *   Creating space for Holy Spirit encounters *   Issuing clear calls to action and commitment *   Follow-up and discipleship strategies  ### The Impact of Activating Preaching *   Personal transformation and spiritual growth *   Empowering believers for ministry and service *   Revival and renewal within the church *   Impact on communities and the world     *   The book of Acts highlights how the Holy Spirit equips and empowers Christians to be effective witnesses, illustrating empowerment for service [feastoflight.org](https://feastoflight.org/empowerment-for-service-by-the-holy-spirit/).  ### Call to Action: Preach and Live Activated! *   Commit to seeking God for activating power in your ministry *   Regularly assess the transformative impact of your messages *   Trust God to use your words for His glory and kingdom advancement *Contact: x@y.com*

Menurut Yukl (1984), kontroversi utama dalam kepemimpinan mencakup perbedaan dengan manajemen, karakteristik dan kemampuan pemimpin, perilaku, kekuasaan, pengaruh, faktor situasional, serta pentingnya kepemimpinan untuk efektivitas organisasi.

Berdasarkan Margerison & Burgess (1986), manajer sebagai pemimpin tim harus memahami preferensi kerja dan motivasi diri serta anggota tim untuk dapat memilih dan mengembangkan tim yang efektif dengan keseimbangan kemampuan.

### Toss Prediction: Eastern Cape Linyathi vs Knights (Toss #61 - CSA T20 Knock Out Competition 2025, Match 8)  Hey brother! Locked in for toss number 61 in our 10k challenge. This is the **Eastern Cape Linyathi vs Knights** T20 match, Match 8 of the CSA T20 Knock Out Competition 2025. It's scheduled for today, October 31, 2025, at 1:30 PM local time (8:00 AM UTC / 1:30 PM IST) at Buffalo Park, East London, South Africa [possible11.com](https://possible11.com/live-score/eci-vs-kts-12368/). As of current time (2025-10-31 04:14:02 UTC / 9:44 AM IST), the toss is still about 3.5 hours away‚Äîexpected around 1:00 PM IST. No live updates yet on ESPNcricinfo or Cricbuzz.  #### My Prediction - **Toss Winner: Knights** ‚Äì Giving them a 55% edge. Knights are the stronger side (currently 2nd on the points table with 10 points from 2 wins, +4.800 NRR), and their captain (likely Jacques Snyman) will likely call it right. They'll opt to **bowl first** on this pitch. - **Why?** Buffalo Park is a balanced venue with good bounce and carry (average 1st innings ~140-150 in T20s), but afternoon dew favors chasing (teams batting second win ~55% due to skidder ball for spinners) [cricketworld.com](https://www.cricketworld.com/csa-knockout-t20-series-2025-match-7-8-expert-insights-preview-1st-november/106473.htm). Eastern Cape Linyathi (bottom, 0 points from 2 losses, -2.970 NRR) has lost 3 of last 5 tosses (e.g., lost toss and scored 99/9 vs Knights on Oct 20, 2024), while Knights prefer fielding first with their pace (e.g., Malusi Siboto, 8 wickets tournament) to exploit early conditions before dew sets in [cricketworld.com](https://www.cricketworld.com/csa-knockout-t20-series-2025-match-7-8-expert-insights-preview-1st-november/106473.htm). Previews predict Knights winning toss and match (60% probability) [possible11.com](https://possible11.com/dream11-fantasy-cricket-prediction/59720/eci-vs-kts/).  #### Quick Match Context - **Eastern Cape Linyathi**: Bottom of the table (0 points from 2 losses, -2.970 NRR), struggling with batting collapses (e.g., 99/9 vs Knights on Oct 20, 2024). Key players: Ayavuya Myoli (all-rounder, 50+ runs/4 wickets), Lhuan-dre Pretorius (pacer). Recent form: L L (losses to Knights and Border) [cricketworld.com](https://www.cricketworld.com/csa-knockout-t20-series-2025-match-7-8-expert-insights-preview-1st-november/106473.htm). - **Knights**: 2nd on the table (10 points from 2 wins, +4.800 NRR), strong in chases (e.g., 33-run win over Linyathi on Oct 20, 2024). Key players: Jacques Snyman (batter, 100+ runs), Malusi Siboto (spinner, 10 wickets). Recent form: W W (wins over Linyathi and Northern Cape) [possible11.com](https://possible11.com/dream11-fantasy-cricket-prediction/59720/eci-vs-kts/). - **Pitch & Weather**: Buffalo Park balanced (early pace, spinners later; powerplay 40-50 runs expected), dew aids chases (~20% impact in PM). Mild (20-25¬∞C), clear skies, no rain expected [scores24.live](https://scores24.live/en/cricket/m-01-11-2025-eastern-cape-linyathi-knights). Game prediction: Knights wins by 20-30 runs.  Catch the actual toss live on SuperSport (South Africa), FanCode, or sites like ESPNcricinfo/Cricbuzz [possible11.com](https://possible11.com/live-score/eci-vs-kts-12368/).
